file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Live Changes API
  description: REST API documentation for the JMeter plugin "Live Changes Config". For more info, head over to our [GitHub repository](https://www.github.com/delirius325/jmeter-live-changes-config)
  version: 0.1.0
servers:
  - url: http://your.host.com/v1
    description: This is a test url meant to represent your host. The only valid part in this is the /v1 path
paths:
  /healthcheck:
    get:
      summary: Simple healthcheck endpoint
      tags:
        - Health
      responses:
        '200':    # status code
          description: OK
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: "connected"
  /threads:
    get:
      summary: Returns info about all thread groups
      tags:
        - Threads
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AllThreadsResponse'
  /threads/{threadName}:
    get:
      summary: Get thread group info by name
      tags:
        - Threads
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: threadName
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: Name of the thread group to retrieve
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SingleThreadResponse'
    post:
      summary: Modify/Update a thread group by its' name
      tags:
        - Threads
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: threadName
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: Name of the thread group to modify
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModifyThreadRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModifyThreadResponse'
  /test/status:
    get:
      summary: Retrieves the status of the running test (duration, running time, etc.)
      tags:
        - Test
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TestStatus'
  /test/end:
    get:
      summary: Signals JMeter to stop the test
      tags:
        - Test
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TestEnd'
  /test/summary:
    get:
      summary: Returns a summary of the results at the time of query
      tags:
        - Test
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TestSummary'
  /variables:
    get:
      summary: Returns all the current variables
      tags:
        - Variables
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetVariables'
    post:
      summary: Modifies the variables specified in the request body
      tags:
        - Variables
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModifyVariablesReq'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModifyVariablesRes'
  /properties:
    get:
      summary: Returns all the current properties
      tags:
        - Properties
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetProperties'
    post:
      summary: Modifies the properties sent in the request body
      tags:
        - Properties
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModifyPropertiesReq'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModifyPropertiesRes'

components:
  schemas:
    AllThreadsResponse:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          threadGroup:
            type: object
            properties:
              scheduler:
                type: object
                properties:
                  duration:
                    type: integer
                  delay:
                    type: integer
              onErrorStopThread:
                type: boolean
              isEnabled:
                type: boolean
              onErrorStopTestNow:
                type: boolean
              comment:
                type: string
              onErrorStartNextLoop:
                type: boolean
              rampUp:
                type: integer
    SingleThreadResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        threadGroup:
          type: object
          properties:
            scheduler:
              type: object
              properties:
                duration:
                  type: integer
                delay:
                  type: integer
            onErrorStopThread:
              type: boolean
            isEnabled:
              type: boolean
            onErrorStopTestNow:
              type: boolean
            comment:
              type: string
            onErrorStartNextLoop:
              type: boolean
            rampUp:
              type: integer
    ModifyThreadRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        threadNum:
          type: integer
          example: 3
    ModifyThreadResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
          example: "Changed number of active threads."
        threadNum:
          type: integer
          example: 3
        info:
          type: string
          example: "success"
    TestStatus:
      type: object
      properties:
        totalThreads:
          type: integer
          example: 8
        startTime:
          type: integer
          example: 1598550485316
        runningTime:
          type: integer
          example: 30
        totalActiveThreads:
          type: integer
          example: 8
    TestEnd:
      type: object
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
          example: "Threads will gracefully stop."
        info:
          type: string
          example: "success"
    TestSummary:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          averageLatency:
            type: integer
            example: 65
          averageResponseTime:
            type: integer
            example: 189
          minResponseTime:
            type: integer
            example: 160
          maxResponseTime:
            type: integer
            example: 503
          hitsPerSecond:
            type: number
            example: 4.98
          sentBytesPerSecond:
            type: number
            example: 1125.41
          totalErrors:
            type: integer
            example: 0
          errorPercentage:
            type: number
            example: 0.0
          receivedBytesPerSecond:
            type: number
            example: 70391.25
          90thPercentile:
            type: integer
            example: 234
          totalSamples:
            type: integer
            example: 162
          totalBytes:
            type: integer
            example: 2289968
          averageBytes:
            type: number
            example: 14135.6
          standardDeviation:
            type: number
            example: 62.85
    GetVariables:
      type: object
      properties:
        START.MS:
          type: integer
          example: 1598550473118
        TESTSTART.MS:
          type: integer
          example: 1598550485316
        JMeterThread.last_sample_ok:
          type: boolean
          example: true
        all_other_variables_will_show_here:
          type: boolean
          example: true
    ModifyVariablesReq:
      type: object
      properties:
        my_variable_name:
          type: string
          example: "my_new_value"
    ModifyVariablesRes:
      type: object
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
          example: "Variables were changed."
        my_variable_name:
          type: string
          example: "my_new_value"
        info:
          type: string
          example: "success"
    GetProperties:
      type: object
      properties:
        beanshell.server.file:
          type: string
          example: "../extras/startup.bsh"
        cookies:
          type: string
          example: "cookies"
        all_other_properties_will_show_here:
          type: boolean
          example: true
    ModifyPropertiesReq:
      type: object
      properties:
        my_property_name:
          type: string
          example: "my_new_value"
    ModifyPropertiesRes:
      type: object
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
          example: "Properties were changed."
        my_variable_name:
          type: string
          example: "my_new_value"
        info:
          type: string
          example: "success"

Error: notImplemented: path "/healthcheck": get: responses: 200: contents: unsupported content types: [text/plain]
